name: Loaded Dice [GMTK 2022]
description:
Avast ye, mateys!

Batten down your hatches, load ‘em dice cannons, and take ye bounty! Battle with a rival crew in this sink or swim skirmish!

Heave ho!

Use the WASD keys and the ARROW keys to roll the dice on the left and right ships respectively. 

Fire in the hole!

Load the dice into the matching cannons and blow up the enemy ship. The bigger the dice, the more damage they take. 

Cleave 'em to the Brisket!

Keep 'yer eyes peeled for special cannons to unleash traps on the enemy deck.

ICEGOOFIRE

Shiver 'em timbers!

Tis' be a 2-pirate local-multiplayer game.  Ye can use PARSEC to duke it out with other pirates across the seven seas.  

An entry to GMTK’s Game Jam 2022, “Roll of the Dice”.
